mapper.insert: insert into company_name_record (pinyin, full_name, name, area, industry, type, update_date) values (#{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select pinyin, full_name, name, area, industry, type, update_date from company_name_record
